column2: Select * FROM Students s WHERE s.username='{0}' AND s.password='{1}'
Select * FROM teachers t WHERE t.username='{0}' AND t.password='{1}'
SELECT privilage_type FROM teachers t WHERE t.username='{0}' AND t.password='{1}'
SELECT fname, lname, town, email, phone FROM Students

SELECT s.student_id, s.fname, t.fname FROM students s JOIN students_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.students_id JOIN courses c ON sc.courses_id = c.courses_id JOIN teachers_courses tc ON c.courses_id = tc.courses_id JOIN teachers t ON tc.teachers_id = t.teachers_id WHERE c.courses_id = ? AND s.student_id = ?
SELECT c.courses_id, c.name FROM students s JOIN students_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.students_id JOIN courses c ON sc.courses_id = c.courses_id WHERE s.student_id = '{0}'

SELECT s.student_id, s.fname AS Students, t.fname AS Teachers FROM students s JOIN students_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.students_id JOIN courses c ON sc.courses_id = c.courses_id JOIN teachers_courses tc ON c.courses_id = tc.courses_id JOIN teachers t ON tc.teachers_id = t.teachers_id WHERE c.courses_id = '{0}'
